name: Outsider Blues
description:
You do not remember anything but the solitude of your home. Surely there were times before...  Times with light and colors...  Times when there were others... The constant gloom and silence of the castle pushes down on you. You long to see the sun, though you can not remember its warmth. There is a tower that leads up through the haze, if only you could find the entrance...  Perhaps you can see the sun again?

Outsider Blues is a solo storytelling game played with a deck of cards and a Jenga tower (or digitally via Tenkiwi). It is based on the Wretched and Alone SRD and written for a "Picture and 1000 Words" jam.

This work is based on The Wretched (found at http://loottheroom.itch.io/wretched), product of Chris Bissette and Loot The Room, and licensed for our use under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license (http:// creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).
